title: Practice Competency Enhancement Program Based on Nursing Entrustable Professional Activities (EPAs)

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practice-centered curriculum for students/job seekers using the EPAs (Entrustable Professional Activities) framework. Project-based assessments conducted in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Achieve over 85% performance accuracy in five core clinical scenarios (e.g., patient assessment, medication management, emergency response) based on EPAs.
Cultivate the ability to provide and incorporate peer feedback using an EPA-based assessment rubric in team-based projects.

After completing three types of EPA (Entrustable Professional Activity) tasks in an online simulation environment, learners can self-assess using a rubric (task accuracy, time management, clinical judgment, self-reflection, improvement plan) and submit a report meeting ≥80% of the five criteria.

resources: EPAs (Entrustable Professional Activities) Evaluation Checklist Template

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
